c45

Class Dataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • c45.Dataset

  • public class Dataset
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to store and perform operations on datasets. Used internally by Decision Tree to implement C4.5 algorithm.
    Author:
    Matthew Tetford

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dataset

        public Dataset()

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(java.lang.String filename)
        Constructs a Dataset from a given text file. Files must be properly formatted csv's. All rows must be the same length. Stray newlines do not matter. All values are converted to lower case.
        Parameters:
        filename - (String): The filename of the file we wish to parse.

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(Dataset superset,
               Value attribute,
               Value value)
        Creates a subset Dataset from the given Dataset.
        Parameters:
        superset - (Dataset): The original dataset.
        attribute - (String): The attribute we will split on.
        value - (String): The value we will split on.

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(Dataset superset,
               Value attribute,
               int value,
               boolean greater_than_equal)
        Creates a subset Dataset from the given Dataset using a continuous split value.
        Parameters:
        superset - (Dataset): The original dataset.
        attribute - (Value): The attribute we will split on.
        value - (int): The value we will split on.
        greater_than_equal - (boolean): Whether we return the upper or lower dataset.

    • Method Detail

      • makeDatasetConsistent

        public void makeDatasetConsistent(Dataset edit)
        Makes the attributes/headers of the datasets consistent. Assumes similiar data is contained within the same columns. The dataset given in parameters is changed.
        Parameters:
        edit - (Dataset): The dataset we wish to make consistent with this one.
